#summary Information for potential programmers

= Programmers Guide =

Titrator is written in [http://www.embarcadero.com/products/delphi Delphi Pascal], the successor langugage of Turbo Pascal, currently owned and supported by  [http://www.embarcadero.com Embarcadero Technologies].  You will require a copy of this (commercial) compiler to work on the Titrator-Delphi code, and you may prefer to work on the [http://code.google.com/p/titrator/ Java version of Titrator] instead.
